name: Birthday Time
description:
Have you ever been in that situation where you need to keep the kids quiet in one place and you can't? So ... The poor clown Dipnlik, who is having a children's party, is going through this. It's time to sing the "Happy Birthday" and he needs to put all the kids in the room for the most important moment of the party. Children run and hide around the house and you need to help him capture them so that he can earn a few bucks. Life is not easy for anyone.


Controls:
Use Mouse to choose options in title

Use Space to Hold Kid or to Find Kid

Use Arrows Keys to Move
